INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This dissertation sought to analyze what types of appreciative strategies can be applied at the Cabo de Santo Agostinho Academic Unit of the Federal Rural University of Pernambuco (UACSA/UFRPE) aiming to engage everyone in environmental awareness processes through a culture of sustainability, as established in the Sustainable Logistics Plan (PLS/UFRPE 2022-2023), focusing on Action Axis 6 (Environmental Awareness). To this end, it was necessary to contextualize this theme through the study of the evolution of environmental issues and the formulation of the concept of sustainable development, as well as dealing with the issue of sustainability in public institutions and, more specifically, in federal universities. The framework adopted was also based on the Appreciative Inquiry approach and methodology, which is qualitative and interpretative. An interview was conducted with the Sustainability Coordinator of the Office of the Dean of Planning and Strategic Management (PROPLAN), combined with action research using the 5-D model (1-D ? Definition, 2-D ? Discovery, 3-D ? Dream, 4-D ? Design and 5-D ? Destiny), with an established cut up to 3-D, which made it possible to recognize strategies that facilitated the engagement of UACSA/UFRPE staff, report strategies that provided support for the study of the culture of sustainability associated with the process of environmental awareness and point out which propositions should be considered necessary in UACSA/UFRPE to achieve the results foreseen in PLS/UFRPE 2022-2023, focusing on Action Axis 6. Thus, questionnaires were applied and three appreciative workshops were held with the members of the focus group, formed by components of the Administrative Technical Council, representing the collegiate made up of teachers, students, managers and employees working at the local level. The results could also be observed during the application of the 5-D model, through the demonstration of interest by teachers in the topic, inclusion

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A Educaзгo para o Empreendedorismo vem ganhando destaque nas esferas
acadкmica, polнtica e empresarial. Compreender o modo como essa temбtica
vem sendo conduzida contribui para o surgimento de novos empreendedores e
aperfeiзoa as competкncias daqueles jб estabelecidos em seus negуcios. Este
estudo tem como objetivo compreender a formaзгo empreendedora oferecida
aos alunos do curso de Administraзгo da Universidade Federal de Roraima
(UFRR). A pesquisa, de natureza qualitativa e descritiva deverб ser realizada
nos campi desta Universidade na cidade de Boa Vista. A coleta de dados
incluiu anбlise documental e entrevistas semiestruturadas com coordenadores
e professores do curso que oferecem disciplinas relacionadas ao
empreendedorismo. Os dados serгo analisados por meio da tйcnica de anбlise
de conteъdo. As reflexхes decorrentes deste estudo poderгo apoiar as aзхes e
atividades desenvolvidas nesse Centro e contribuir para a expansгo de
polнticas pedagуgicas de ensino-aprendizagem que venham a oferecer
avanзos teуricos e metodolуgicos de ensino-aprendizagem para o campo da
educaзгo voltada para o empreendedorismo.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Entrepreneurship Education has been gaining prominence in the spheres
academic, political and business. Understanding how this theme
has been conducted contributes to the emergence of new entrepreneurs and
improves the skills of those already established in their businesses. This
study aims to understand the entrepreneurial training offered
to students of the Administration course at the Federal University of Roraima
(UFRR). The research, of a qualitative and descriptive nature, must be carried out
on the campuses of this University in the city of Boa Vista. Data collection
included document analysis and semi-structured interviews with coordinators
and course teachers who offer subjects related to
entrepreneurship. The data will be analyzed using the analysis technique
of content. The reflections arising from this study may support actions and
activities developed in this Center and contribute to the expansion of
teaching-learning pedagogical policies that will offer
theoretical and methodological advances in teaching-learning for the field of
education focused on entrepreneurship.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Esta dissertaзгo pauta-se por buscar compreender como a educaзгo para o empreendedorismo (EpE) amparada na challenge-based learning (CBL) pode contribuir para o aperfeiзoamento do comportamento empreendedor de alunos de graduaзгo na perspectiva da Teoria da Aprendizagem Experiencial (TAE) de David Kolb. O estudo de caso ъnico se caracteriza pela singularidade da metodologia Projetгo, executada em forma de disciplina na Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE), campus Recife. A partir da abordagem CBL, os alunos em equipes interdisciplinares assumem o centro da aprendizagem para solucionar problemas da sociedade civil por meio da execuзгo de 10 (dez) desafios (quests), que envolve pesquisas de campo, testes e validaзхes junto аs partes interessadas, enquanto os professores atuam como mediador do ensino por intermйdio dos feedbacks fornecidos em sala de aula apуs as apresentaзхes das quests semanais e nas mentorias fora da sala de aula. A escolha do caso ocorreu sobretudo em vista de questхes de conveniкncia para a pesquisadora. O caso apresenta caracterнsticas peculiares que o diferenciam de outros casos de metodologias de ensino com abordagem experiencial, representadas pelo contexto geogrбfico em que se insere a UFPE, sede do parque tecnolуgico urbano conhecido como Porto Digital; pelos resultados alcanзados com a participaзгo dos alunos na disciplina como geraзгo de startups de sucesso e os egressos conseguem vaga de emprego em ambientes de trabalho inovadores; replicaзгo da metodologia de ensino em outras instituiзхes de ensino e a disciplina contribui com o alcance dos Objetivos de Desenvolvimento Sustentбvel (ODS). Efetuou-se anбlise documental, seguida de observaзгo participante com a produзгo de fotografias e diбrio de campo, e, por fim, foram aplicadas entrevistas semiestruturadas com os alunos e professores. A metodologia de ensino atende aos preceitos da abordagem CBL no que se refere a possibilidade de o aluno se envolver com o mundo real, interdisciplin
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This dissertation seeks to understand how entrepreneurship education (EpE) supported by challenge-based learning (CBL) can contribute to improving the entrepreneurial behavior of undergraduate students from the perspective of David Kolb's Experiential Learning Theory (TAE). The single case study is characterized by the uniqueness of the Projetгo methodology, implemented as a discipline at the Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE), Recife campus. Based on the CBL approach, students in interdisciplinary teams take the center of learning to solve problems in civil society by executing 10 (ten) challenges (quests), which involve field research, testing, and validation with stakeholders, while professors act as mediators of teaching through feedback provided in class after the presentations of the weekly quests and in mentoring sessions outside the classroom. The choice of the case occurred mainly in view of issues of convenience for the researcher. However, the case presents peculiar characteristics that differentiate it from other cases of teaching methodologies with an experiential approach, represented by the geographic context in which UFPE is located, where the urban technology park known as Porto Digital is located; by the results achieved with the participation of students in the discipline, such as the generation of successful startups and the graduates obtaining jobs in innovative work environments; replication of the teaching methodology in other educational institutions and the discipline contributes to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Document analysis was carried out, followed by participant observation with the production of photographs and a field diary, and finally, semi-structured interviews were applied with students and teachers. Thus, it is clear that the teaching methodology meets the precepts of the CBL approach regarding the possibility of the student engaging with the real world, interdisciplinarity, autonomy, teamwo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O advento dos novos tempos protagoniza processos produtivos que se
fundamentam na criatividade, conhecimento e processamento de informaзхes, cujos
empreendimentos originam artefatos culturais que ressignificam identidades
culturais e relaзхes sociais. Assim, o desenvolvimento de tecnologias e de
conhecimento digitais possibilita acesso а internet e intercвmbio cultural, mas acirra
embates na arena de lutas pela significaзгo e ocasiona fenфmeno denominado de
hibridismo cultural. Nessa perspectiva, a sociedade pode adotar valores de uma
cultura estrangeira, enfraquecendo sua cultura nacional. A indъstria da animaзгo
constitui exemplo de setor que se desenvolve rapidamente devido а emergкncia de
novas tecnologias e representa posiзхes conflitantes de interesses culturais. Nesse
mercado, empresas como a Disney, Pixar e a DreamWorks se concentram em
desenvolver estratйgias de expansгo de seus negуcios e gerenciamento de suas
tecnologias para se tornarem lнderes de mercado. Logo, desenvolver estratйgias
dirigidas para se conseguir atender аs demandas atuais da sociedade por produtos
do audiovisual com estйtica atraente e que estejam disponнveis na plataforma
acessadas pelo consumidor representa um desafio para os realizadores culturais
brasileiros que precisam se reinventar no sentido de continuarem presentes no
cenбrio competitivo e restrito ao mercado do audiovisual. Esse setor se constitui
como campo fйrtil para a pesquisa cientнfica a respeito de novas direзхes, desafios e
caracterнsticas estruturais de organizaзхes no вmbito da economia criativa, uma vez
que, evidenciam como as lideranзas dessas organizaзхes acompanham a dinвmica
dos sistemas produtivos vigentes com o objetivo de alcanзarem sustentabilidade a
longo prazo de seus empreendimentos culturais. Diante da constataзгo de que a
atuaзгo coletiva de empreendedores culturais presentes nas produtoras de
animaзгo possibilita a expansгo de negуcios culturais no campo da animaзгo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The advent of new times is the protagonist of productive processes that are based on
creativity, knowledge and information processing, whose undertakings originated
cultural actions that re-signify cultural identities and social relations. Thus, the
development of technologies and digital knowledge enables access to the internet
and cultural exchange, but intensifies clashes in the arena of struggles for meaning
and causes a phenomenon called cultural hybridism. From this perspective, society
can adopt values ​​from a foreign culture, weakening its national culture. The
animation industry is an example of a sector that develops rapidly due to the
emergence of new technologies and represents conflicting positions of cultural
interests. In this market, companies like Disney, Pixar and DreamWorks focus on
developing strategies to expand their businesses and manage their technologies to
become market leaders. Therefore, developing strategies aimed at meeting society's
current demands for audiovisual products with attractive aesthetics and that are
available on the platform accessed by the consumer represents a challenge for
Brazilian cultural producers who need to reinvent themselves in order to remain
present in the competitive scenario. and restricted to the audiovisual market. This
field is fertile for scientific research on new directions, challenges and characteristics
of organizations within the creative economy, since they show how the leaders of
these organizations follow the dynamics of current production systems with the
objective of achieving sustainability long term of their cultural endeavors. Thus, in
view of the fact that the collective action of cultural entrepreneurs in animation
production companies enables the expansion of cultural businesses in the field of
animation, making them relevant in the national economy and culture, we aim to
identify in this study the way in which the action of the cultural entrepreneu

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A adoзгo de prбticas criativas como elemento diferenciador, agregador de riqueza e vantagem competitiva tem sido impulsionada por agentes da iniciativa privada e formuladores de polнticas pъblicas na conjuntura de desenvolvimento dos destinos turнsticos. As representaзхes culturais que permeiam o uso do termo criatividade no contexto do turismo criativo nгo estгo claramente definidas, resultando em uma polissemia conceitual e uma fragmentaзгo teуrica em torno das prбticas turнsticas diferenciadas pela criatividade. Os estudos que estendem a discussгo de modo a considerar as questхes culturais, sociais e valores simbуlicos envolvidos no turismo criativo sг escassos. Fato que suscita a seguinte questгo: como ocorre a formaзгo discursiva do produtor cultural em torno da articulaзгo de significados do termo criatividade no contexto do turismo criativo? A composiзгo teуrica que dб suporte ao debate se ancora nos Estudos Culturais, em especial nos desenvolvimentos teуricos do Circuito da Cultura proposto por Du Gay et al e seu modelo de articulaзгo dos momentos de produзгo, consumo, identidade, regulaзгo e representaзгo do artefato cultural. Projetamos a construзгo do corpora, composto por documentos e entrevistas, para acessar os discursos que permeiam as aзхes dos produtores culturais de turismo criativo, enquanto sujeitos do estudo. Os resultados da anбlise do discurso apontam que as articulaзхes discursivas sгo direcionadas ao processo de ressignificaзгo da criatividade no contexto do turismo criativo para atender demandas pъblicas relacionadas ao desenvolvimento local e а sustentabilidade, como forma de construзгo de significados benйficos em torno do artefato cultural. O sistema discursivo indica a crenзa implнcita dos produtores culturais de que a criaзгo de valor simbуlico proporcionada pela difusгo de significados positivos seja refletida em trocas econфmicas.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The adoption of creative practices as differentiating element, aggregator of wealth and competitive advantage has been driven by private sector agents and public policy makers in the context of development of tourist destinations. The cultural representations that permeate the use of the term creativity in the context of creative tourism are not clearly defined, resulting in a conceptual polysemy and a theoretical fragmentation around tourism practices differentiated by creativity. Studies that extend the discussion to consider the cultural, social and symbolic values involved in creative tourism are scarce. This fact raises the following question: how does the discursive formation of the cultural producer occur around the articulation of meanings of the term creativity in the context of creative tourism? The theoretical composition that supports the debate is anchored in Cultural Studies, especially in the theoretical developments of the Circuit of Culture proposed by Du Gay et al and its model of articulation of the moments of production, consumption, identity, regulation and representation of the cultural artifact. We designed the construction of the corpora, composed of documents and interviews, to access the discourses that permeate the actions of cultural producers of creative tourism, as subjects of the study. The results of the discourse analysis indicate that the discursive articulations are directed to the process of re-signification of creativity in the context of creative tourism to meet public demands related to local development and sustainability, as a way of building beneficial meanings around the cultural artifact. The discursive system indicates the implicit belief of cultural producers that the creation of symbolic value provided by the diffusion of positive meanings is reflected in economic exchanges.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A atual crise de refugiados atinge nъmeros sem precedentes na histуria mundial. Atй dezembro de 2021, eram mais de 89 milhхes de pessoas deslocadas forзadamente devido a guerras, conflitos armados e perseguiзхes. Fenфmeno que se destaca sobretudo em paнses e regiхes ditas em desenvolvimento e que compartilham problemas socioeconфmicos, para os quais adotamos o conceito de Sul global. Uma migraзгo nesses parвmetros й o que encontramos quando nos deparamos com o maior кxodo populacional da histуria recente da Amйrica Latina, que й a atual diбspora venezuelana, com mais de 6 milhхes de exilados desde 2013 em suas jornadas para os paнses vizinhos como o Brasil, um paнs que se encontra permeado por distintas crises. Uma conjuntura que tende a tornar a integraзгo desses migrantes hostil. Frente a tal problema, defendemos que prбticas permeadas pela economia solidбria podem favorecer um intercвmbio de saberes que facilitam o processo de integraзгo dos migrantes. Dentro deste contexto, tivemos como objetivo principal descrever a integraзгo de migrantes por sobrevivкncia no Sul global de maneira a desvelar saberes que possibilitam o processo. Como objetivos especнficos, traзamos um panorama dos primeiros anos da integraзгo venezuelana, identificamos desafios presentes na integraзгo econфmica dos migrantes venezuelanos ao Brasil, iluminamos ossaberes necessбrios aos migrantes para contornar os desafios, e, por fim, interpretamos o papel das prбticas de economia solidбria na superaзгo dos desafios pelos migrantes. O que nos levou a utilizar como principais teorias auxiliares o processo de integraзгo e a mobilidade bloqueada (blocked mobility). Para tal, visando um direcionamento em prбticas e experiкncias daqueles que sido sistematicamente vнtimas de injustiзas causadas pelas lуgicas de dominaзгo hegemфnicas, adotamos um posicionamento epistemolуgico assentado no pensamento pуs-abissal de Boaventura de Sousa Santos. Razгo pela qual escolhemos o estudo de ca
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The current refugee crisis reaches unprecedented numbers in world history. As of December 2021, there were more than 89 million people forcibly displaced due to war, armed conflict and persecution. A phenomenon that stands out above all in so-called developing countries and regions that share socioeconomic problems, for which we have adopted the concept of the global South. A migration in these parameters is what we find when we are faced with the largest population exodus in the recent history of Latin America, which is the current Venezuelan diaspora, with more than 6 million exiles since 2013 on their journeys to neighboring countries such as Brazil, a country that is permeated by different crises. A situation that tends to make the integration of these migrants hostile. Faced with this problem, we defend that practices permeated by the solidarity economy can favor an exchange of knowledge that facilitates the process of integration of migrants. Within this context, our main objective was to describe the integration of migrants for survival in the global South in order to reveal knowledge that makes the process possible. As specific objectives, we outline an overview of the first years of Venezuelan integration, identify challenges present in the economic integration of Venezuelan migrants to Brazil, illuminate the knowledge needed by migrants to overcome the challenges, and, finally, we interpret the role of solidarity economy practices. in overcoming challenges for migrants. This led us to use the integration process and blocked mobility as the main auxiliary theories. To this end, aiming to guide the practices and experiences of those who were systematically victims of injustices caused by hegemonic domination logics, we adopted an epistemological position based on the post-abyssal thought of Boaventura de Sousa Santos. That's why we chose Michael Burawoy's extended case study as our primary methodology. Through it, we focus on the case of

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A бgua й um elemento essencial а vida, e, portanto, precisa estar disponнvel em qualidade e quantidades adequadas para todos. Entretanto, o uso exacerbado desse recurso pode comprometer a recuperaзгo natural e causar o seu esgotamento. Uma forma para gerenciar os recursos de uso comum, assim como a бgua, de um modo que atenda as necessidades atuais e futuras, й a governanзa formada por grupos autogeridos, tal como uma comunidade de povos tradicionais que detйm o controle dos recursos em seu territуrio. Para anбlise mais profunda dos elementos que compхem a governanзa da бgua, sob a perspectiva da governanзa dos recursos comuns, teorizada por Elinor Ostrom, й preciso compreender que hб elementos responsбveis pelas aзхes dos indivнduos podendo favorecer ou prejudicar o alcance da sustentabilidade. Nesse sentido, o realismo crнtico й uma abordagem que permite acessar os mecanismos geradores, tendкncias e poderes, que compхem uma estrutura que disparam as aзхes e provocam os eventos do mundo. Dessa forma, essa tese se ancora na possibilidade de que uma visгo realista sobre os elementos da governanзa de Ostrom podem esclarecer questхes encobertas e permitir entender como se configura a governanзa da бgua como um bem comum no contexto do semiбrido brasileiro. Para isso, foi adotado um percurso metodolуgico que seguiu o processo de construзгo teуrica da Teoria Adaptativa, atravйs de um movimento entre trкs ciclos que alternou o foco na teoria e nos dados, unindo a teoria com a pesquisa empнrica para explicar como configuraзхes particulares de atividade e estrutura se combinam para produzir resultados especнficos. Os resultados encontrados sugerem que os mecanismos que atuam gerando as tendкncias de comportamento em um grupo autogovernado estгo presentes em uma camada da realidade que precisa ser considerada para que se aprofunde na compreensгo dos elementos que regem o comportamento observбvel nas interaзхes. Dessa forma, o desenvolvimento do quadro final avanзou na compre
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Water is an essential element for life, and therefore needs to be available in quality and amounts suitable for all. However, exacerbated use of this resource may compromise natural recovery and cause its exhaustion. One way to manage common resources, as well as water, in a way that meets current and future needs, is the governance formed by self-managed groups, such as an indigenous community. For deeper analysis of the elements that make up water governance, from the perspective of the governance of common resources, theorized by Elinor Ostrom, it must be understood that there are elements responsible for actions leading to the lack of coordination and inequality perceived in water management and may impair the scope of sustainability. In this sense, critical realism is an approach that allows you to access the generating mechanisms, trends and powers that make up a structure that trigger the actions and provoke the events of the world. Thus, this thesis is anchored in the possibility that a realistic view of the elements of Ostrom governance can clarify covered issues and allow to understand how water governance is configured as a common good in the context of the Brazilian semiarid. To this end, a methodological path was adopted that followed the theoretical construction process of adaptive theory, through a movement between cycles that alternates the focus on theory or data, joining theory with empirical research to explain as configurations of activity and structure combine to produce specific results. The results founded suggest that the mechanisms that act to generate behavioral tendencies in a self-governed group are present in a layer of reality that needs to be considered to increase the understanding of the elements that govern the observable behavior in interactions. In this way, the development of the final framework has advanced in understanding the underlying elements that constitute the rules, the attributes of the community and the attributes of t

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The complexity of multicultural realities and the understanding that reality is socially
constructed have brought Organizational Studies closer to sociologically structured
organizational processes. In this direction, it is argued that sociology enriches organizational
theory, bringing it closer to its primary focus: the organization itself. A transition is observed
in research, where the traditional focus on "tasks" gives way to the contemporary emphasis on
"practices" and "processes". This epistemological shift demands the retheorization of the
theoretical and conceptual framework of the field. In this context, the study of individual and
organizational identities arouses growing interest and questions in the area of management and
organization. In this sense, this study aims to understand the organizational identity of the
popular fair in Caruaru-PE and the organization of the stallholders' territories through the
theoretical-methodological instrument of the Circuito da Cultura (DU GAY et al., 2013). The
model proposed by Du Gay et al. (2013) offers a means of investigating agency/structure
dynamics and empirically examining organizational identity fragmentation and multiple
identifications within an organization. Within the scope of this study, analyzing how subjects
from popular cultures identify with their territories also involves understanding how
neoliberalism delimits the construction of organizational identity and how this impacts,
positively and negatively, on the constitution of space and individuals. Furthermore, we sought
to understand how these articulations shape organizational identity, enabling the existence and
maintenance of these territories in the global and local context. In view of the above, this thesis
focuses on the following research question:How is the organizational identity of the Caruaru
Fair articulated to organize the territories of popular cultures?The corpus of this study was based
on linguistic resources and

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The importance of networks for entrepreneurs is unquestionable. Through them, it is possible
to access different types of resources, identify new market opportunities, share risks and enable
the construction of reputation, advice and legitimacy for entrepreneurs. As networks, affect is
an essential dimension of entrepreneurship. Due to its deeply emotional context and its
relevance in entrepreneurial processes, such as in recognizing opportunities and acquiring
resources. However, despite the relevance of networks and affect for entrepreneurship, there is
a lack of research that relates affect to networks, denominated affective networks, in the context
of entrepreneurship and cultural entrepreneurship. The aim of this research is to understand how
affect impacts cultural entrepreneurship networks. The study is anchored in theories about
entrepreneurship and its networks, cultural entrepreneurship, affect and affective practice.
Methodologically, we conducted a multi-sited ethnography in four food markets, national and
international. As a technique for collecting empirical material, we used ethnographic
interviews, participant observation, documents, visual and audiovisual records. Narrative
analysis supported the analysis and interpretation of information. The thesis is structured in the
form of articles. This research resulted in five national and international productions, including
articles and a teaching case. The objective of the first article is to build an integrated and critical
overview of the academic production on networks and entrepreneurship, developing and
discussing new perspectives to renew future research. The second article aims to build an
integrated and critical overview of the academic production on affect and entrepreneurship,
developing and discussing new perspectives to renew future research. The objective of the third
article was to understand how affective networks sustain cultural entrepreneurship. The fourth
article e

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O processo decisуrio nгo й uma abordagem fбcil de ser resolvida dada a necessidade de balanceamento das variбveis envolvidas e o anseio de se atender a objetivos conflitantes. No contexto das empresas do Polo de Confecзхes do Agreste (PCAP), esse processo assume uma complexidade ainda maior em virtude da imprevisibilidade inerente ao mercado da moda, da coexistкncia de empresas formais e informais e da incorporaзгo de familiares nas funзхes mais qualificadas e melhor remuneradas nas empresas. A tomada de decisгo, nessas empresas, acontece geralmente de forma individual, sem o uso mйtodos ou modelos sistemбticos de decisгo e baseada na intuiзгo dos gestores, que utilizam heurнsticas decisуrias como atalhos para lidarem com as limitaзхes cognitivas e a complexidade da tarefa de decisгo, limitando o potencial de crescimento de cada empresa individualmente. No entanto, ao olhar os dados do PCAP de maneira global, percebe-se um crescimento significativo do setor, que impulsiona o mercado local, e o torna representativo ? economicamente e socialmente ? tanto para a regiгo quanto para o paнs. Diante dessas perspectivas, o desenvolvimento deste estudo se dedica а anбlise do processo decisуrio heurнstico, com o intuito de compreender como as prбticas de decisгo das empresas do Polo de Confecзхes do Agreste de Pernambuco influenciam seu desempenho operacional, considerando que operam em um cenбrio de decisхes complexo e incerto. Metodologicamente, a pesquisa realizada й de natureza bбsica, exploratуria e observacional, utilizando uma abordagem qualitativa para interpretaзгo dos resultados, amparada no paradigma funcionalista. Optou-se pelo estudo de caso ъnico com a anбlise das evidкncias seguindo a tйcnica de anбlise de conteъdo temбtica. A pesquisa foi operacionalizada a partir da seleзгo de dez micro e pequenas empresas atuantes no PCAP, e os resultados indicaram a existкncia da relaзгo entre fatores de aspectos pessoais e fatores contextuais da decisгo
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The decision-making process is not an easy approach to solve, given the need to balance the variables involved and the desire to answer conflicting objectives. In the context of companies in the Polo de Confecзхes do Agreste (PCAP), this process becomes even more complex due to the unpredictability inherent in the fashion market, the coexistence of formal and informal companies, and the incorporation of family members into the most qualified and best-paid roles in the companies. Decision-making in these companies generally occurs individually, without the use of systematic decision-making methods or models, and based on the experience of managers, who use decision-making heuristics as shortcuts to deal with cognitive limitations and the complexity of the decision-making task, limiting the growth potential of each company individually. However, when looking at the PCAP data globally, it is perceived significant growth in the sector, which drives the local market and makes it representative ? economically and socially ? for both the region and the country. In view of this problem, this study is dedicated to analyzing the heuristic decision-making process, with the aim of understanding how the decision-making practices of companies in the Polo de Confecзхes do Agreste influence their operational performance, considering that they operate in a complex and uncertain decision-making scenario. Methodologically, the research carried out is basic, exploratory and observational, using a qualitative approach to interpret the results, supported by the functionalist paradigm. A case study was chosen, with the analysis of the evidence following the thematic content analysis technique. The research was carried out based on the selection of ten micro and small companies operating in the PCAP and the results indicated the existence of a relationship between personal aspects and contextual factors of the decision in influencing decision-making practices. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The relationship between entrepreneurship, economic development and culture is central to understanding the context of the creative economy. Lounsbury and Glynn's (2001; 2019) concept of cultural entrepreneurship consolidates an integrative understanding of the relationship between entrepreneurship, development and culture, proposing innovative perspectives for studies in the creative economy. This thesis is guided by the concept of cultural entrepreneurship, aiming to understand the existence and functioning of the creative economy, as well as the creation of markets for cultural goods, more specifically, the creation of markets for artisanal goods. The potential of artisanal work in the creative economy is highlighted, as this craft enables inclusive social growth, in addition to developing more sustainable economies. This study assumes that, through linguistic devices (such as entrepreneurial narratives), artisans will be able to fulfill their potential to capture resources and generate wealth. In light of these findings, this thesis sought to understand how entrepreneurial action in crafts contributes to fostering creative economy initiatives, promoting the necessary conditions for economic growth and inclusive social development. To this end, an empirical study was conducted with key actors in the crafts segment in the city of Joгo Pessoa-PB ? the artisans ? using a qualitative approach and semi-structured interview techniques, observation and document analysis. The procedure for analyzing the empirical materials consisted of qualitative content analysis. The results of the research indicated three predominant narratives used by artisans from Joгo Pessoa-PB as strategies to create meaning and identity: the story of the piece, the personal story and the story of respectful innovation. By sharing these entrepreneurial narratives, artisans not only promote the dissemination of local culture, but also strengthen tourism and contribute to the inclusive social develo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Como compreender o empreendedorismo sem considerar as materialidades que o constituem, visto que o prуprio empreendimento й uma sociomaterialidade? Entender essa interaзгo entre recursos materiais e relaзхes sociais й fundamental para desvendar como o empreendedorismo pode gerar soluзхes inovadoras e resilientes, especialmente em contextos desafiadores. A pesquisa explora como a materialidade constitui o empreendedorismo cultural por meio da lente sociocultural, integrando teorias sobre empreendedorismo, empreendedorismo cultural e estudos da antropologia sobre a cultura material. A abordagem metodolуgica foi baseada em uma pesquisa qualitativa, de carбter exploratуrio, fundamentada na autoetnografia. O campo empнrico incluiu duas comunidades tradicionais e uma rede nacional de comunidades tradicionais. Como tйcnicas de coleta de material empнrico, empregamos entrevistas autoetnogrбficas, observaзгo participante, anбlise de documentos, alйm de registros visuais e audiovisuais. Esta pesquisa resultou em cinco artigos. O objetivo do primeiro artigo й revisar a produзгo acadкmica, destacando focos de conceitos e impactos a cerca da sociomaterialidade no empreendedorismo, propondo ainda uma "lente sociocultural", que reconhece a materialidade como viva. O segundo artigo visa explicar a materialidade da mentalidade empreendedora a partir de uma lente sociocultural, redefinindo a mentalidade como um fenфmeno coletivo que emerge de interaзхes sociais, prбticas culturais e recursos tangнveis, que a partir da lente sociocultural й vista em um estado de "fluir"e constituнda de trкs etapas: provocaзгo, ativaзгo e revitalizaзгo material. O terceiro artigo, tem como objetivo explicar a identificaзгo e aзгo frente a oportunidades a partir de uma lente sociocultural e propхe a oportunidade como sustentada por princнpios como percepзгo do cenбrio, atendimento a necessidades e estratйgias materiais, que incluem o fortalecimento da memуria, revitalizaзгo das rela
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: How can we understand entrepreneurship without considering the materialities that make it up, given that entrepreneurship itself is a sociomateriality? Understanding this interaction between material resources and social relations is fundamental to unravelling how entrepreneurship can generate innovative and resilient solutions, especially in challenging contexts. The research explores how materiality constitutes cultural entrepreneurship through a sociocultural lens, integrating theories on entrepreneurship, cultural entrepreneurship and anthropological studies on material culture. The methodological approach was based on qualitative, exploratory research based on autoethnography. The empirical field included two traditional communities and a national network of traditional communities. As techniques for collecting empirical material, we used autoethnographic interviews, participant observation, document analysis, as well as visual and audiovisual recordings. This research resulted in five articles. The aim of the first article is to review academic production, highlighting concepts and impacts around sociomateriality in entrepreneurship, while also proposing a ?sociocultural lens? that recognises materiality as alive. The second article aims to explain the materiality of the entrepreneurial mindset from a sociocultural lens, redefining the mindset as a collective phenomenon that emerges from social interactions, cultural practices and tangible resources, which from the sociocultural lens is seen in a state of ?flow? and consists of three stages: provocation, activation and material revitalisation. The third article aims to explain how to identify and act on opportunities from a sociocultural lens and proposes the opportunity as being underpinned by principles such as perceiving the scenario, meeting needs and material strategies, which include strengthening memory, revitalising relationships and connecting with material flows. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O contexto da pesquisa destaca a transformaзгo da administraзгo pъblica, incluindo governos e instituiзхes pъblicas, por meio de novas tecnologias de gestгo, como a aplicaзгo de programas para diminuir as diversas formas de violкncia. Essas inovaзхes visam otimizar processos, melhorar tomadas de decisхes e envolver os diversos autores de forma eficiente. No ambiente da era digital, os estudos culturais evidenciam o contexto de implementaзгo de polнticas, enquanto a governanзa pъblica e interdisciplinar, torna-se essencial para enfrentar desafios, como a violкncia no Brasil. A tese busca compreender como as novas tecnologias de gestгo existentes na бrea da seguranзa pъblica sгo representadas na sociedade, com foco na governanзa pъblica e influкncia das mнdias sociais. O estudo segue uma abordagem qualitativa e inclui anбlise de discurso enquanto anбlise das informaзхes a partir do estudo de caso dos programas Alerta Celular e Pacto Pela Vida ? Juntos pela Seguranзa. A pergunta central й: como as novas tecnologias de gestгo sгo debatidas e resistidas na sociedade contemporвnea, especialmente em um contexto de governanзa pъblica influenciadas por mнdias sociais na internet? A anбlise das informaзхes demonstra que a ausкncia de mecanismos formais de participaзгo da sociedade nas questхes que envolvem as novas tecnologias de gestгo, como o Programa Alerta Celular, na governanзa da seguranзa pъblica impulsiona a sociedade a buscar alternativas digitais para se manifestar sobre essas polнticas pъblicas. As mнdias sociais emergem como um espaзo de contrapoder, permitindo que a sociedade civil exerзa um papel ativo na discussгo dessas polнticas pъblicas, ainda que de forma nгo oficial. Essa participaзгo cidadг, embora nгo institucionalizada, demonstra a capacidade das redes sociais, enquanto tecnologias da informaзгo e comunicaзгo, no novo espaзo da governanзa digital.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The research context highlights the transformation of public administration, including governments and public institutions, through new management technologies, such as the implementation of programs aimed at reducing various forms of violence. These innovations seek to optimize processes, improve decision-making, and efficiently engage diverse stakeholders. In the digital era, cultural studies underscore the context of policy implementation, while public and interdisciplinary governance becomes essential to address challenges such as violence in Brazil. This thesis aims to understand how new management technologies in the field of public security are represented in society, focusing on public governance and the influence of social media. The study adopts a qualitative approach and includes discourse analysis as a method to examine information, using the case studies of the Alerta Celular and Pacto Pela Vida ? Juntos pela Seguranзa programs. The central research question is: How are new management technologies debated and resisted in contemporary society, particularly within a context of public governance influenced by social media? The analysis reveals that the absence of formal mechanisms for societal participation in matters involving new management technologies, such as the Alerta Celular Program in public security governance, drives society to seek digital alternatives to voice opinions on these public policies. Social media emerges as a space of counter-power, enabling civil society to play an active role in discussing these public policies, albeit in an unofficial capacity. This citizen participation, though not institutionalized, demonstrates the potential of social networks, as information and communication technologies, within the new domain of digital governance.

Atualmente, observamos o crescimento da polarizaзгo polнtica global, atribuнda ao
populismo de extrema direita e debates sobre imigraзгo, intensificada pela expansгo
tecnolуgica, resultando na proliferaзгo de discursos de уdio nos meios digitais. A expansгo do
acesso аs tecnologias da informaзгo reduziu desigualdades no acesso а informaзгo, mas
tambйm destruiu a ilusгo de neutralidade tecnolуgica, revelando seu carбter politizado e
perpetuando desigualdades de raзa, gкnero e classe. As discriminaзхes e opressхes foram
reproduzidas nos designs tecnolуgicos, reforзando desigualdades offline sob o pretexto de
segmentaзгo e personalizaзгo, estereotipando usuбrios com base em dados coletados. Nesse
contexto, a manosfera emergiu como um espaзo onde ideologias misуginas prosperam, com
grupos como os "Red Pills" alegando que o feminismo promove falsas narrativas de exploraзгo
feminina, enquanto homens sгo os verdadeiros explorados. Esses grupos buscam invalidar e
deturpar o movimento feminista, reforзando a hostilidade contra mulheres e o feminismo. Por
outro lado, o ativismo feminista digital tem ganhado forзa, especialmente apуs a pandemia de
COVID-19, unindo mulheres em torno de visхes de mundo semelhantes e sensibilizando sobre
desigualdades de gкnero. O humor tem sido uma ferramenta eficaz para difundir o feminismo
digital e expor machismos, facilitando a identificaзгo com as causas feministas. Influenciadoras
digitais desempenham um papel crucial, dissolvendo barreiras entre esferas pъblica e privada,
offline e online, e atuando como agentes de mudanзa social dentro da lуgica da economia digital
neoliberal. Essas influenciadoras adotam uma agкncia polнtica de consumo, promovendo
mudanзas sociais e combatendo a misoginia atravйs de prбticas de prossumerismo. Elas
utilizam sua influкncia para transformar a sociedade, apesar de estarem inseridas na economia
de mercado. O conceito de mimese й central para entender como essas mulheres combatem a
misog
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: We are currently witnessing the growth of global political polarization, attributed to far-right populism and debates over immigration, intensified by the expansion of technology, resulting in the proliferation of hate speech in digital media. The expansion of access to information technology has reduced inequalities in access to information, but it has also destroyed the illusion of technological neutrality, revealing its politicized nature and perpetuating inequalities of race, gender and class. Discrimination and oppression have been reproduced in technological designs, reinforcing offline inequalities under the guise of segmentation and personalization, stereotyping users based on collected data. In this context, the manosphere has emerged as a space where misogynistic ideologies thrive, with groups such as the ?Red Pills? claiming that feminism promotes false narratives of female exploitation, while men are the real exploited. These groups seek to invalidate and distort the feminist movement, reinforcing hostility towards women and feminism. On the other hand, digital feminist activism has gained momentum, especially after the COVID-19 pandemic, uniting women around similar worldviews and raising awareness about gender inequalities. Humor has been an effective tool for spreading digital feminism and exposing machismo, facilitating identification with feminist causes. Digital influencers play a crucial role, dissolving barriers between public and private spheres, offline and online, and acting as agents of social change within the logic of the neoliberal digital economy. These influencers adopt a political agency of consumption, promoting social change and combating misogyny through prosumer practices. They use their influence to transform society, despite being inserted in the market economy. The concept of mimesis is central to understanding how these women combat misogyny by revisiting and reappropriating misogynistic discourses, deconstructing them, and prom

Os Objetivos Especнficos residem em:

GreenMetric, THE Impact Rankings e QS World University Rankings:

● Investigar a importвncia atribuнda aos rankings de sustentabilidade

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A governanзa algorнtmica tem se consolidado como um importante instrumento
na gestгo pъblica, especialmente na бrea de seguranзa. Este estudo analisou
a viabilidade da implementaзгo dessa abordagem Programa Juntos Pela
Seguranзa na Cidade do Recife, com o objetivo de compreender como a
Secretaria de Defesa Social de Pernambuco pode integrar algoritmos na
formulaзгo e execuзгo de polнticas de seguranзa pъblica. Buscou-se identificar
os desafios, benefнcios e riscos dessa adoзгo, considerando o cenбrio nacional
e internacional. A metodologia adotada envolveu revisгo bibliogrбfica, anбlise
documental e estudo de programas existentes, com enfoque no Programa
Juntos Pela Seguranзa na Cidade do Recife. A pesquisa tambйm considerou
aspectos regulatуrios e operacionais, bem como a estrutura atual de
governanзa no Programa Juntos Pela Seguranзa na Cidade do Recife. Os
resultados indicaram que a aplicaзгo da governanзa algorнtmica pode otimizar
a alocaзгo de recursos, fortalecer a prevenзгo criminal e aperfeiзoar os
processos decisуrios. No entanto, foram identificadas barreiras como a falta de
padronizaзгo regulatуria, riscos йticos e a necessidade de capacitaзгo dos
profissionais envolvidos. Concluiu-se que a implementaзгo da governanзa
algorнtmica no Programa Juntos Pela Seguranзa na Cidade do Recife й viбvel,
desde que acompanhada de regulamentaзгo adequada, supervisгo humana
contнnua e mecanismos de transparкncia. O estudo contribui para a discussгo
sobre inovaзгo tecnolуgica na seguranзa pъblica e sugere diretrizes para
futuras implementaзхes no setor.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Algorithmic governance has established itself as an important tool in public management, especially in the area of ​​security. This study analyzed the feasibility of implementing this approach in the Together for Security Program in the City of Recife, with the aim of understanding how the Department of Social Defense of Pernambuco can integrate algorithms in the formulation and execution of public security policies. The aim was to identify the challenges, benefits, and risks of this adoption, considering the national and international scenario. The methodology adopted involved a bibliographic review, document analysis, and study of existing programs, with a focus on the Together for Security Program in the City of Recife. The research also considered regulatory and operational aspects, as well as the current governance structure of the Together for Security Program in the City of Recife. The results indicated that the application of algorithmic governance can optimize the allocation of resources, strengthen crime prevention, and improve decision-making processes. However, barriers were identified, such as the lack of regulatory standardization, ethical risks and the need for training of the professionals involved. It was concluded that the implementation of algorithmic governance in the Juntos Pela Seguranзa Program in the City of Recife is viable, as long as it is accompanied by adequate regulation, continuous human supervision and transparency mechanisms. The study contributes to the discussion on technological innovation in public security and suggests guidelines for future implementations in the sector.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O objetivo geral do estudo se concentra em buscar compreender como o contexto social e cultural
em que os estudantes estгo inseridos contribui para o aperfeiзoamento do comportamento empreendedor
nas pedagogias de EpE com abordagem experiencial. Para isso, tem-se como objetivos especнficos: (a)
descrever o contexto social e cultural em que os estudantes estгo inseridos, (b) identificar os resultados que
as pedagogias de ensino com abordagem experiencial podem proporcionar para o aluno e para outros atores
da sociedade civil; e (c) analisar o processo de absorзгo de conhecimento em empreendedorismo na
perspectiva da Teoria Sociocultural do Desenvolvimento Cognitivo de Lev Vygotsky.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The general objective of the study focuses on seeking to understand how the social and cultural context in which students are inserted contributes to the improvement of entrepreneurial behavior in EpE pedagogies with an experiential approach. To this end, the specific objectives are: (a) to describe the social and cultural context in which students are inserted, (b) to identify the results that teaching pedagogies with an experiential approach can provide for students and other actors in civil society; and (c) to analyze the process of knowledge absorption in entrepreneurship from the perspective of Lev Vygotsky's Sociocultural Theory of Cognitive Development.
